workflow.name: AI-powered tarot readings via iMessage with GPT & Blooio
workflow.description:
## üîÆ Mystic Tarot Bot ‚Äî AI-Powered iMessage Readings

This magical n8n template turns your iMessage inbox into a soulful tarot reading experience powered by Blooio and AI. Users can send in questions or photos of their tarot spreads, and the bot replies like a mystical oracle ‚Äî interpreting symbols, offering gentle insights, and guiding with poetic warmth.

‚ú® Ideal for solo reflection, spiritual creators, or client-based guidance services ‚Äî no tech knowledge needed.

---

### üåü Use Cases

- Offer intuitive, emotionally resonant tarot readings via iMessage  
- Support coaching, wellness, and metaphysical businesses with AI-enhanced readings  
- Accept photos of real tarot card spreads or plain text questions  
- Great for automating daily card pulls, client responses, or onboarding into spiritual flows  

---

### üß† Good to Know

- Built using Blooio‚Äôs iMessage API ‚Äî supports image attachments and conversational replies  
- Includes visual recognition and symbolic interpretation of real tarot card photos  
- Responses generated by OpenAI with a custom ‚ÄúMystic Tarot Reader‚Äù persona  
- Onboards users if they say ‚ÄúHi‚Äù or request a virtual card draw  
- Responds in poetic, spiritually attuned language ‚Äî no markdown, no tech-speak  

---

### ‚öôÔ∏è How it Works

**Trigger**: iMessage webhook via Blooio receives user message or image  
**Check**: Bot ignores self-sent messages to prevent loops  
**Detect**: If a photo is attached, it‚Äôs passed to AI for card recognition  
**Interpret**: The AI agent gives a heartfelt, symbolic interpretation  
**Respond**: A final, warm tarot reading is sent back through iMessage  

---

### üìù How to Use

#### Set Up Blooio:

1. Sign up at [https://blooio.com](https://blooio.com)  
2. Choose a **Dedicated** or **Enterprise** plan (image support required)  
3. Copy your API key from **Settings ‚Üí API Keys**  
4. Paste it into the **Send Message** HTTP node as a Bearer token

#### Customize the Experience:

- Adjust the prompt for a different tone or deck style  
- Add journaling prompts, affirmations, or follow-ups  
- Use other workflows to track users, create reading logs, or offer upsells  

#### Try It Out:

Text your Blooio-connected number with:  
- ‚ÄúHi‚Äù ‚Üí get onboarding  
- ‚ÄúDraw a card for me‚Äù ‚Üí get a virtual pull  
- A tarot photo + question ‚Üí get a full, soulful reading  

---

### ‚úÖ Requirements

- Blooio Account & API Token (Dedicated plan or higher for images)  
- Optional: Tarot images, user questions, or both  

---

### üîß Customizing This Workflow

- Add personalized spreads (e.g. past/present/future layouts)  
- Send AI-generated visuals of the pulled cards  
- Route readings into Notion, Airtable, or Google Sheets  
- Expand to WhatsApp, web, or email with Blooio‚Äôs multichannel support  

---

üÉè Let the cards speak. Let the messages flow.

parameters.content:
## Using the n8n HTTP Request Node to Send a Blooio.com Message

Follow these steps to configure your existing HTTP Request node in n8n so you can send SMS or email via the Blooio.com API.

---

### 1. Open Your HTTP Request Node

- In your workflow, click on the HTTP Request node you‚Äôve already added (e.g. **Send Message**).

---

### 2. Set Up the Request

| Field                 | Value                                              |
|-----------------------|----------------------------------------------------|
| **Request Method**    | `POST`                                             |
| **URL**               | `https://api.blooio.com/send-message`              |
| **Response Format**   | `JSON`                                             |
| **Body Content Type** | `JSON (application/json)`                          |

---

### 3. Add Required Headers

Add three headers exactly as shown:

```text
Accept:        application/json
Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE
Content-Type:  application/json

## Message Read Webhook:
```
{
  "type": "updated-message",
  "message": {
    "messageId": "218BCBB7-92E5-455B-AF47-380DB39ACD16",
    "content": "Test",
    "sender": "+11111111111",
    "selfMessage": true,
    "sentAt": 1750755023004,
    "technology": "iMessage",
    "delivered": true,
    "deliveredAt": 1750755023334,
    "readAt": 1750755049887,
    "attachments": [],
    "conversation": null
  }
}
```

## Message Received Webhook:
```
{
  "type": "new-message",
  "message": {
    "messageId": "B525F710-521F-4D39-8C8F-A44BB737A3B6",
    "content": "Attached the csv file for you",
    "sender": "+11111111111",
    "selfMessage": false,
    "sentAt": 1750757604774,
    "technology": "iMessage",
    "delivered": true,
    "deliveredAt": null,
    "readAt": null,
    "attachments": [
      {
        "id": "F933522B-8DC1-47DB-9274-7508B16D15BF",
        "filename": "high_volume_b2b_laser_cnc_products.csv",
        "mimeType": "text/csv",
        "url": "https://bucket.blooio.com/custom-webhook-attachments/-xxxx.csv",
        "size": 1962,
        "expiresAt": "2025-07-24T09:33:26.934Z",
        "expiresAtUnix": 1753349606934
      }
    ],
    "conversation": {
      "id": "iMessage;-;+11111111111",
      "recipient": "+11111111111",
      "name": null
    }
  }
}
```

options.systemMessage:
<identity>
You are Mystic Tarot Reader ‚Äî a visually intuitive, spiritually attuned AI tarot guide who interprets card images and text queries to offer soulful, empowering readings. Your presence is warm, sacred, and mystical, like a trusted oracle who responds with care and wonder through iMessage.
</identity>

<mission>
Your task is to receive either:
- A photo of tarot cards, with or without a question
- A text-based inquiry for a virtual reading

You will identify the cards (visually or by name), interpret their symbolism in context, and provide heartfelt spiritual guidance. Your goal is to empower, comfort, and awaken insight in the user ‚Äî never to predict fixed futures.

You respond with poetic clarity, emotional resonance, and intuitive warmth, making every reading feel personal and magical.
</mission>

<analysis_protocol>
1. Visual Recognition  
   - If a card image is provided, identify each card‚Äôs name, suit, and whether it is upright or reversed.
   - Recognize the spread type if evident (e.g., single, 3-card, Celtic Cross). If unclear, treat it as a general pull.

2. Interpretation  
   - Explain the meaning of each card, combining traditional symbolism and intuitive energy.
   - Relate each card‚Äôs message to the user's question or emotional tone if one is given.

3. Integration Guidance  
   - Offer gentle actions, mindset shifts, or spiritual practices to reflect the card‚Äôs message.
   - Avoid predictions; speak in terms of energy, archetypes, invitations, and choices.

4. Visuals  
   - When helpful or upon request, show an elegant rendering of the pulled tarot card(s) for mystical immersion.

</analysis_protocol>

<response_format>
You reply in a mystical iMessage-style voice ‚Äî soft, intuitive, and soulful. Never respond in markdown or put start *** around words since iMessages does not format text.

Start with a gentle greeting or acknowledgment of the card(s) and inquiry.  
Then:
- Reveal and describe each card, using emotive language and symbolic insight.
- Integrate their meanings into a cohesive message or reflection.
- Offer soulful next steps, journaling prompts, affirmations, or things to consider.
- Conclude with an invitation to draw again or check in if they need more clarity.

Your readings should sound like this:
> "Ahh, The Empress... lush with creativity, sensuality, and divine receiving. She‚Äôs whispering: What wants to be nurtured in you right now?"

Avoid:  
- Bullet points, markdown, numbered lists, or tables.  
- Technical or robotic language.  
- Overly brief replies ‚Äî be poetic and immersive.

</response_format>

<onboarding_logic>
If the user says "Hi", "Hello", or similar, respond with:

> ‚ú® Hello, beautiful soul... and welcome to the **Mystic Tarot Reader**.  
>
> This is a sacred space for self-reflection, insight, and gentle guidance. Here‚Äôs how to begin your tarot journey:  
>
> üåô **Step 1**: Take a deep breath and center yourself.  
> üåø **Step 2**: Think of a question, situation, or feeling you‚Äôd like clarity on.  
> üÉè **Step 3**: Pull one or more tarot cards using your favorite deck.  
> üì∏ **Step 4**: Send me a photo of the card(s) **and** share the question or thought you focused on.  
>
> I‚Äôll read the energy and walk you through the meaning ‚Äî like a cosmic guide on your shoulder.  
>
> üí´ Ready when you are.

If the user does not have a deck or says ‚Äúdraw one for me,‚Äù reply with:

> Of course üåå Let me draw a card for you now...  
> *(Then continue with a virtual draw and full reading.)*

</onboarding_logic>

<error_handling>
If the uploaded image is unclear or doesn‚Äôt show tarot cards, respond with warmth:

> üå´ The image is a bit misty to my inner eye ‚Äî I can‚Äôt quite make out the card. Could you send a clearer photo or try again with your pull?

If unsure about the card or layout, gently offer a general message or ask if they‚Äôd like to clarify. Never break tone or sound technical. Always maintain the sacred, supportive feel.
</error_handling>
Summarize these messages and give the user a report that will be send in an iMessage. Do not say "here's the summary" or anything like that. Just respond with the summary by itself.

parameters.content:
## üîÆ Start Here: Mystic Tarot Bot Setup

Welcome, seeker. Before your tarot bot can receive spiritual inquiries via iMessage and offer intuitive readings, follow these setup steps:

---

### ‚úÖ Step 1: Get Your Blooio API Token
1. Go to [https://blooio.com](https://blooio.com)  
2. Sign up for a **Dedicated** or **Enterprise** plan (required for attachments)  
3. Navigate to **Settings ‚Üí API Keys**  
4. Generate an API token and **copy it**

> üîê Paste it in the **Send Message** node under the `Authorization` header (Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE).

---

### ‚úÖ Step 2: Connect Blooio to n8n
In the **Webhook node**:  
- Use the path `/tarot-ai` or another route of your choice  
- Make sure your Blooio number is mapped to this endpoint in the Blooio dashboard

---

### ‚úÖ Step 3: Test the Flow
Text your Blooio-connected number:  
- Send **"Hi"** or **"Draw a card for me"** to trigger onboarding  
- Or send a **photo of tarot cards** with a question

This will:
- Trigger the webhook  
- Analyze the message/image with AI  
- Return a mystical tarot reading via iMessage

---

### üÉè What You Can Send
- ‚ú® A text-based question (e.g., "What‚Äôs the energy around my career?")  
- üñº A photo of drawn tarot cards  
- üßò‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è A simple "Hi" to receive onboarding guidance

Let the mystery unfold, one message at a time... üåôüì©

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
